content: in december 2020 a civil case was heard in the vilnius city district court regarding the dissolution of a marriage the defendant has been ordered to pay court fees of €704 the court decided to dissolve the marriage and awarded the defendant with several vehicles it was determined that these vehicles were never owned by the applicant the text discusses the division of community property between spouses and mentions a deviation from equal sharing the applicant is seeking the dissolution of the marriage due to the defendants abusive behavior the court needs to determine the ownership and division of assets including the vehicles the court will consider the interests of the children and the financial situation of the parties the court has approved the request for a divorce and ordered the defendant to pay the court fees
